abstract: Letter from Sen Mike Lee responds to June 23 Op-Ed column by Sen Jeanne Shaheen calling on Congress to renew visa program offering refuge to thousands of Afghan interpreters who contributed to United States war effort.
snippet: Senator Mike Lee, on his objection to an amendment offered by Senator Jeanne Shaheen....
lead_paragraph: Senator Mike Lee, on his objection to an amendment offered by Senator Jeanne Shaheen.
